panels.description: Показывает количество главных дежурных и запасных дежурных в разрезе времени в каждой команде
panels.title: Количество дежурных в различных командах

targets.rawSql:
with api_twt as (
  SELECT sum(value) as api_twt from sla_db.indicators
  where name = 'prober_get_team_by_name_success_total'
  and observed_at < now() and observed_at >= now() - interval 1 day
),
api_tdt as (
  select sum(value) as api_tdt from sla_db.indicators
  WHERE name = 'prober_get_team_by_name_fail_total'
  and observed_at < now() and observed_at >= now() - interval 1 day
),
db_twt as (
  SELECT sum(value) as db_twt from sla_db.indicators
  where name = 'prober_mysql_connection_success_total'
  and observed_at < now() and observed_at >= now() - interval 1 day
),
db_tdt as (
  select sum(value) as db_tdt from sla_db.indicators
  WHERE name = 'prober_mysql_connection_fail_total'
  and observed_at < now() and observed_at >= now() - interval 1 day
),
page_twt as (
  SELECT sum(value) as page_twt from sla_db.indicators
  where name = 'prober_web_page_availability_success_total'
  and observed_at < now() and observed_at >= now() - interval 1 day
),
page_tdt as (
  select sum(value) as page_tdt from sla_db.indicators
  WHERE name = 'prober_web_page_availability_fail_total'
  and observed_at < now() and observed_at >= now() - interval 1 day
)
select 
    (api_twt - api_tdt)/api_twt * 100,
    (db_twt - db_tdt)/db_twt * 100,
    (page_twt - page_tdt)/page_twt * 100
from sla_db.indicators,
api_twt, api_tdt, db_twt, db_tdt, page_twt, page_tdt

SELECT value, is_bad * slo as error, slo, observed_at as datetime from sla_db.indicators
where name = 'prober_get_team_by_name_success_total'
ORDER BY observed_at

SELECT value, is_bad as error, slo, observed_at as datetime from sla_db.indicators
where name = 'prober_get_team_by_name_fail_total'

SELECT value, is_bad as error, slo, observed_at as datetime from sla_db.indicators
where name = 'prober_get_team_by_name_duration_seconds'

SELECT value, is_bad * slo as error, slo, observed_at as datetime from sla_db.indicators
where name = 'prober_mysql_connection_success_total'

SELECT value, is_bad as error, slo, observed_at as datetime from sla_db.indicators
where name = 'prober_mysql_connection_fail_total'

SELECT value, is_bad as error, slo, observed_at as datetime from sla_db.indicators
where name = 'prober_mysql_connection_duration_seconds'

SELECT value, is_bad * slo as error, slo, observed_at as datetime from sla_db.indicators
where name = 'prober_web_page_availability_success_total'

SELECT value, is_bad * slo as error, slo, observed_at as datetime from sla_db.indicators
where name = 'prober_web_page_availability_fail_total'

SELECT value, is_bad * 5 as error, slo, observed_at as datetime from sla_db.indicators
where name = 'prober_web_page_availability_duration_seconds'
